title: An Overused Item: Corrupting Potion
body:
Good morning,



within the last months **Corrupting Potion** {{item:2033}} has become an usual start on most **Toplaners** and **Midlaners** that use Mana. Looking at it's former use it was an item to counter excessive **Poke** in the **Laning Phase** or to give **Mana Sustain** to **Champions** which usually don't rush **Tear** {{item:3070}} (since the would start of with a **Sapphire Crystal** {{item:1027}} most of the times). 
However, in the momentary stage of the game **Corrupting Potion** {{item:2033}} has become a massively overused Item in **Top- and Midlane**. Especially with the **Time Warp Tonic Rune** it is able to grant **Sustain** to those who usually have a rather weak **Laning Phase**. 


As a **Toplane** player, I am quite disappointed about that since it makes some **Lanes** quite boring, since outtrading your opponent will just end in them popping a **Corrupting Potion** {{item:2033}} and being nearly full-life afterwards. In adittion to that **Corrupting Potion** {{item:2033}} grants a huge damage boost in the early levels. 


The champions that I often see with this item has grown to a huge number, some of them abusing that item insanely well: _Aurelion Sol_ {{champion:136}}, _Azir_ {{champion:268}} , _Ekko_ {{champion:245}} , _Fiddlesticks_ {{champion:9}} , _Fiora_ {{champion:114}} , _Fizz_ {{champion:105}} , _Galio_ {{champion:3}} , _Gangpank_ {{champion:41}} , _Heimerdinger_ {{champion:74}} , _Irelia_ {{champion:39}} , _Jax_ {{champion:24}} , {{champion:43}} _Karma_ {{champion:43}} , _Kassadin_ {{champion:38}} , _LeBlanc_ {{champion:7}} , _Lissandra_ {{champion:127}} , _Malphite_ {{champion:54}} , _Malzahar_ {{champion:90}} , _Maokai_ {{champion:57}} , _Nasus_ {{champion:75}} , _Olaf_ {{champion:2}} , _Ornn_ {{champion:516}} , _Pantheon_ {{champion:80}} , _Poppy_ {{champion:78}} , _Rumble_ {{champion:68}} , _Singed_ {{champion:27}} , _Sion_ {{champion:14}} , _Swain_ {{champion:50}} , _Taliyah_ {{champion:163}} , _Talon_ {{champion:91}} , _Teemo_ {{champion:17}} , Twisted Fate {{champion:4}} , Urgot {{champion:6}} , Veigar {{champion:45}} , _Vel'Koz_ {{champion:161}} , _Viktor_ {{champion:112}} , _Xerath_ {{champion:101}} , _Zoe_ {{champion:142}} and _Zyra_ {{champion:143}} .
 

I don't want to express that all those champions are overpowered or abuse **Corrupting Potion** {{item:2033}} well, I just want **Riot** to notice how many champions are already using (some more often, some less often) **Corrupting Potion** {{item:2033}} as a **Starting Item** and how it massively decreases the effort some champions have to put into the **Laning Phase** to succeed. 


As the item has become that overused I personally would be glad to see the Item get a nerf in the near future. 
**Please post your opinions and thoughts in the comments and take part in the poll. **



Sincerely, Capitalism FTW.

{{sticker:garen-swing}}
